timeline.message: Trying to update test to mongodb structure
fixup! Fix JNI linking after restructuring
Fix test without resolving all API leaks

timeline.bodyText:
We mostly use this to check that people called Realm.init() as it loaded the native code and make sure we have a reference to getFilesDir.
If we must make it public, it would make most sense to have it on Realm I think.
timeline.author: cmelchior

timeline.bodyText: Having this public feels problematic. What classes need to call this that don't live in io.realm ?
timeline.author: cmelchior

replies.bodyText: Yes it is problematic. It was used from SyncedRealmMigrationTests Moved SyncedRealmMigrationTests to io.realm and added an extension method SyncConfiguration.Builder.testSchema as that was the only reason for putting it in io.realm.mongodb.sync.
replies.author: rorbech

timeline.bodyText: Probably doesn't hurt, although it does bloat the public API for very little value.
timeline.author: cmelchior

replies.bodyText: Yep. Will move it to internal util.
replies.author: rorbech

timeline.message: Convert utility classes to Kotlin after moving it to Kotlin source set
Move Request to internal mongodb package

Revert "Convert utility classes to Kotlin after moving it to Kotlin source set"

This reverts commit 10aa6a4f32974d3ffcbda5599052086ead75a9d6.
Leave Java test utils in Java source set
Add Java test utils source to kotlin-extension android test source set
Fix BaseRealmExt->RealmExt renaming errors for kotlin-extension tests

timeline.bodyText: Since this now lives in internal, it is perfectly fine to have public constructors. So this FIXME can probably just be removed
timeline.author: cmelchior
